Disease.Name: CARDIOMYOPATHY, FAMILIAL DILATED
Disease.Synonym: CARDIOMYOPATHY, FAMILIAL IDIOPATHIC; CARDIOMYOPATHY, FAMILIAL DILATED; CMD1A
Disease.Summary: rare ;autosomal dominant ;autosomal recessive ?;mutation in the lamin A/C gene;Lamin A/C deficiency is probably the most common cause of familial dilated cardiomyopathy [Malhotra R 2009]
